definitions.definition: not giving or having much light:
examples: The lamp gave out a dim light.

definitions.definition: If your eyes are dim, you cannot see very well.
something that you remember slightly, but not very well:
examples: I had a dim recollection of having met her before.

definitions.definition: to (make a positive feeling or quality) become less strong:
examples: Our hopes/expectations dimmed as the hours passed.
